DOC.brief_summary: This study explore safety effectiveness different dos AGN 203818 relieve Irritable Bowel Syndrome pain . The study conduct 2 part . Part A enrolled 213 pt dose either 3 , 20 , 60 mg AGN 203818 placebo 4 week treatment duration . Part B enroll 320 pt dose either 60 , 100 , 160 mg BID AGN 203818 placebo 12 week treatment duration .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Oral AGN 203818 Relief Irritable Bowel Syndrome Pain
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis Irritable Bowel Syndrome Moderate severe IBS pain Any uncontrolled disease Pregnant nursing female
